reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: Works great, very even lighting within switch and multiple connection options makes for a very easy installation. Looks very nice in the dark but like any ordinary paddle switch in a lighted room. Now I can find that elusive switch in the dark as I stumble in to make my coffee in the early morning. Reasonable price.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2025
reviews.title: Easy installation, works perfectly, looks great.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: I bought another brand of these and was disappointed by the poor design where you could see the led directly through a gap between the decora paddle and the frame. These were definitely made by someone who knows design. The light is just bright enough to be seen through the paddle and without a gap at the top to see the LED. Bonus is that they have a much nicer feel when turned on/off.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2025
reviews.title: Professional Design

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: Based on other reviews we were worried that it would produce too much or little light or that the light would be awkward around the switch, but it has actually worked really well. Glad we took the chance and went with it. We have a dark blue bathroom which makes seeing the light switch difficult. This is a perfect amount of light, the switch is easy to find and the install was easy. It would be great if they moved to an insert the wire/click install like newer switches, but not expected since many are still at a traditional install. We would recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
reviews.title: Works as expected

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: My house is old and some of the electrical switches and outlets are old. My light switch does not have a neutral wire, it only has 2 wires. This switch does not require a neutral wire, which is exactly what I needed. I didn’t need a “nightlight” or a bright light because this switch is in my walk-in closet. I just needed a light that would help me locate the switch and this is perfect! Very easy to install. Light is a cool white, not a warm light. The switch looks like any switch, you don’t know there’s a light there until it’s off & dark. Great switch for a great price.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2024
reviews.title: Perfect for older electrical light switches

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W

reviews.title: Great buy

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: One of my leviton decora switches in a bank of three, lost its illumination. All of the old leviton switches used a nice orange glow. When they switch to LED, for some reason they selected a harsh white. I wish they would use LEDs that somewhat match the old switches as replacing one in a bank of three looks absolutely horrible. Not to mention the pure white light is not pleasant on the eyes
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024
reviews.title: Works well, but......

reviews.text: Item received was in used condition with a garage sale tag no less still attached to the crushed box... Missing screws and has a faulty illumination switch. Could have been a fire hazard to someone not knowing what they are looking at and installed it.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: There’s not much to say about a light switch…This one works great as expected. My original switch glowed orange when it was turned off, it was in a bathroom and offered some light to see in the dark. I could not find the orange switches anywhere. These glow white but it’s not overwhelming, it is in no way a nightlight. It offers just enough glow to locate it in a dark room.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
reviews.title: Great Switches

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: Nice switch with good wire contacts, but the color was a shock to us. Can't mix these with older switches (unless you want to 'color code' I guess). BTW, If using it to switch an outlet like we did it doesn't light up unless something is plugged in - with the tiniest load such as a lamp or power strip it lights up as expected.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024
reviews.title: blueish-white illumination doesn't match other switches!

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: These draw less current than their neon counterparts. They, somehow magically, illuminate very dimly with NOTHING plugged into the outlet - wheras their neon counterparts were completely dark. Additionally, whereas their neon counterparts would illuminate very dimly with an LED load, these will illuminate at full brightness with all of the LED loads I've experienced. They're just really really expensive for my liking...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2024
reviews.title: Worked great. Works as intended.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 15 Amp Decora LED Illuminated Light Wall Switch Single-Pole, White, L5611-2W
reviews.text: If you have 2 light switches in a dark hallway like me, this single pole won’t work. I didn’t know that you need a double pole. Not super bright, but it lets you know where the switch is. They don’t carry them on display at my Home Depot, glad Amazon has them
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2024
reviews.title: Like it
